messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: freebies
messages.msgSnippet: On Mon, 10 Sep 2001 15:09:28 -0400 Janet F Hamlin  ... It is when he is killing himself doing things others can do!  Actually, I took over
messages.messageBody:
On Mon, 10 Sep 2001 15:09:28 -0400 "Janet F Hamlin" <jefhdvm@...>
writes:
> >>That problem was my husband who could not leave
> the dishes or laundry undone. <<
>
> This is a problem?? Send that man over here!!! LOL
>
> Janet
>
>

It is when he is killing himself doing things others can do! Actually, I
took over mowing too because he had virtually no free time. Now he does
and we are all much happier! (Then I lost my mowing job to the exchange
student who just loves playing on the tractor)

Bridget

~~~~If electricity comes from electrons...does that mean that morality
comes from morons?~~~~
I sent my Soul through the Invisible,
Some letter of that After-life to spell;
And by and by my Soul returned to me,
And answered, "I Myself am Heaven and Hell." -- The Rubaiyat
